anytime: Hello There!

Some people are so poor, all they have is money.
 - Bob Marley

In the end, it's not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years.
 - Abraham Lincoln

Very little is needed to make a happy life: it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
 - Marcus Aurelius

If it is not right, do not do it
 if it is not true, do not say it.
 - Marcus Aurelius

Do, or Do Not; There Is No Try.
 - Yoda

Be the one that makes people think there is still good in the world.
 - Miamoto Musashi

I think probably kindess is my number one attribute in a human being.
 I'll put it before an of the things like courage, or bravery, or generosity, or anything else.
 - Roald Dahl

Returning hate for hate multiplies hate, adding deeper darkness to a night already devoid of stars.
 Darkness cannot drive out Darkness,
 only light can do that.
 Hate cannot drive out hate
 only love can do that.
 - Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don't have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
 - Seneca.

It is better to think about what's ahead, than behind.
 - Claudio Sanchez

Not all those who wander are lost.
 - J.R.R. Tolkien

To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. 
 - Ralph Waldo Emerson

The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart. 
 - Hellen Keller

All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us. 
 - Gandalf/J.R.R. Tolkien

Many that live deserve death, and some that die, deserve life.  Can you give it to them Frodo? 
 - Gandalf/J.R.R. Tolkien

Even the very wise cannot see all ends. 
 - Gandalf/J.R.R. Tolkien

A true friend is one who walks in when other walk out. 
 - Marvin J. Ashton

We can't direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails. 
 - Thomas S. Monson

Do not let the world make  you hard.  Do not let pain make you hate. Do not let the bitterness steal your sweetness. 
 - Gordon B. Hinckley

Doing the right thing, is never the wrong thing. 
 - Ted Lasso

Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced. 
 - Kierkegaard

Kindness Matters. 
 - Random Internet Stranger

Strength doesn't come from what you can do, it comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't do. 
 - Elizabeth Smart

The happpiness of your life, depends on the quality of your thoughts. 
 - Marcus Aurelius

What stands in the way, becomes the way. 
 - Marcus Aurelius

The definition of instanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. 
 - Unknown (Not Einstein)
afternoon: You're more fun than bubble wrap!
